root.name: Power Punch 2
root.description: OverviewPower Punch II is an NES boxing game in which the player takes the role of Mark Tyler, who enters a competition against a series of alien boxing opponents. An early version of the game was called Mike Tyson's Intergalactic Power Punch, and featured Tyson as the protagonist, but at some point, Tyson was dropped from the game. Subsequently, Tyson became Tyler, and flamboyant boxing promoter Don King was replaced with a generic fictional character.
